text: Bayou Blue is an unincorporated community and census-designated place in Lafourche and Terrebonne parishes, Louisiana, United States. Its population was 12,352 as of the 2010 census. ==Geography== According to the U.S. Census Bureau, the community has an area of ; of its area is land, and is water. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Lafourche Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Terrebonne Parish, Louisiana Category:Unincorporated communities in Louisiana Category:Census-designated places in Lafourche Parish, Louisiana Category:Census-designated places in Terrebonne Parish, Louisiana Category:Census-designated places in Louisiana
title: Bayou Blue, Louisiana
